item.title: Getting started with imagemagick
item.description: Convert an image between file formats # Using the magick command (or `convert for IM 6.x users) you con convert any image format to any other. with no other arguments, as little processing as possible will be done to move from one format to the other. Simply specify your input and output files. To convert a JPEG to a PNG: $ magick image.jpg image.png Or a TIFF to a GIF:
